from qiskit_aqua.utils import CircuitFactory
from qiskit_aqua.utils.circuit_utils import controlled_hadamard, multi_toffoli_q



[docs]class S0Factory(CircuitFactory):

    def __init__(self, num_target_qubits):
        super().__init__(num_target_qubits)


[docs]    def required_ancillas(self):
        if self.num_target_qubits == 1:
            return 0
        else:
            return max(1, self._num_target_qubits - 1)



[docs]    def required_ancillas_controlled(self):
        if self.num_target_qubits == 1:
            return 0
        else:
            return self._num_target_qubits



[docs]    def build(self, qc, q, q_ancillas=None, params=None):
        if self.num_target_qubits == 1:
            qc.z(q[0])
        else:
            for q_ in q:
                qc.x(q_)
            qc.x(q_ancillas[0])
            qc.h(q_ancillas[0])
            q_controls = [q[i] for i in range(len(q))]
            q_ancillas_ = [q_ancillas[i] for i in range(len(q_ancillas))]
            multi_toffoli_q(qc, q_controls, q_ancillas_[0], q_ancillas_[1:])
            qc.h(q_ancillas[0])
            qc.x(q_ancillas[0])
            for q_ in q:
                qc.x(q_)



[docs]    def build_inverse(self, qc, q, q_ancillas=None, params=None):
        self.build(qc, q, q_ancillas, params)



[docs]    def build_controlled(self, qc, q, q_control, q_ancillas=None, params=None):
        if self.num_target_qubits == 1:
            qc.cz(q_control, q[0])
        else:
            for q_ in q:
                qc.cx(q_control, q_)
            qc.cx(q_control, q_ancillas[0])
            controlled_hadamard(qc, q_control, q_ancillas[0])
            q_controls = [q_control] + [q[i] for i in range(len(q))]
            q_ancillas_ = [q_ancillas[i] for i in range(len(q_ancillas))]
            multi_toffoli_q(qc, q_controls, q_ancillas_[0], q_ancillas_[1:])
            controlled_hadamard(qc, q_control, q_ancillas[0])
            qc.cx(q_control, q_ancillas[0])
            for q_ in q:
                qc.cx(q_control, q_)



[docs]    def build_controlled_inverse(self, qc, q, q_control, q_ancillas=None, params=None):
        self.build_controlled(qc, q, q_control, q_ancillas, params)
